pkgmetadata.longdescription: Testing for Spatial Independence of Cross-Sectional Qualitative Data // Testing for Spatial Dependence of Qualitative Data in Cross Section. The list of functions includes join-count tests, Q test, spatial scan test, similarity test and spatial runs test. The methodology of these models can be found in doi:10.1007/s10109-009-0100-1 and doi:10.1080/13658816.2011.586327.
